title: Beautiful 3 Bedroom in Prime Livonia/Northville
posting_body: Looking for a beautiful new 3 bedroom apartment to call home?
We now can book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!

Offering the ideal combination of comfort and luxury, life at The Liv Apartments is powered by superior service and framed by natural style and location, putting everything you want within easy reach.
Pets: Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)
Deposit: $500 up to one month’s rent depending on credit
Application fee: $50 per applicant over the age of 18.
Appliances: Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Range/Oven, Washer and Dryer
Facilities and Recreation: Shared heated pool/spa, Fitness center, Clubhouse, Barbecue grills, Work Space, Putting Green
Security and Access: Elevator, Controlled access
